info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 2:52PM EDT until June 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FULTON AND WEST CENTRAL SARATOGA COUNTIES... At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Northampton Beach Public Campground, or 12 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Northville, Mayfield, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Cranberry Creek, Batchellerville, Fairchilds Corners, Fish House, Munsonville, Sweets Crossing, Benedict, Hagedorns Mills, Fayville, Union Mills, Skinner Corners, Gorthey Corners, Carpenters Corners, Dennies Hollow, Green Corners and Osbourne Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
